observations: First-year PhD candidate at HKUST NLP Group
Graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) in June 2024
Research focuses on natural language processing and machine learning
Research interests include LLM Reasoning and Reinforcement Learning
Research interests include Hallucination in Vision-Language Models (VLM)
Research interests include LLM truthfulness and Interpretability
Ph.D. in Computer Science (2024-Present) at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
B.Eng. (2020-2024) at Shanghai Jiao Tong University
Research Intern at MINIMAX (February 2025 - Present)
